## TileLoader.onDone() method

Called when loading and decoding has finished successfully. Resolves loading promise if the state is Ready, otherwise it rejects the promise with the supplied state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onDone(doneState: TileLoaderState): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doneState | [TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md) | The latest state of loading. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
